title: The Colony
occurrences: We can't let him infect the rest of the colony.
Look. This colony started with over 400 people.
Calling Colony Five, this is Colony Seven. Over.
Colony Five, this is Colony Seven. Come on, guys, over...
- What's up? - SOS loop from Colony Five.
A few hours ago we received a distress signal from Colony 5.
Given that Colony 3 shuttered last year, I think they're worth checking up on.
We made a pact with Colony Five and we need to look after each other.
They just put the whole colony at risk.
Briggs to Colony Seven, Cooper, come in.
Colony Seven here. Good to hear your voice, Briggs.
so we should reach Colony Five by noon tomorrow.
We're from Colony Seven. We got your distress signal.
We're gonna take you back to Colony Seven with us.
Radio Colony Seven. You tell them we're on our way back.
Calling... Colony Seven.
Colony... Seven, can you read me? Over.
Colony... Seven, come in.
- to the colony... - We'll stop them at the bridge. Come on.
Everybody at Colony Five is dead.
